Articles.Content:
I made a big rocket for the Mun with a "Mamouth II" engine with 4 solid fuel booster and the TWR was about 1.6, and the launchpad, the mission started very slowly (too slowly for a TWR of 1.6) and my speed has caped at 13.8 m/s and than the rocket started decelerating.

My config :
i5-4690 @3.5 GHz CPU
20.0 Gb DDR3 ram
and a GTX 1050 Ti GPU
Looks to be a bug I had too, I used the manual engine throttle sliders when I right clicked the engine in the mean time.
